ej.nls

Class BasicImmutablesNLS

  • java.lang.Object
    • ej.nls.NLS
      • ej.nls.BasicImmutablesNLS

  • public class BasicImmutablesNLS
extends NLS
    A BasicImmutablesNLS is a NLS implementation based on immutables. The immutables must be defined as follow:
    • An array named [header]_locales contains the list of available locales.
    • An array for each available locale containing a list of messages named [header]_[locale].
      All these arrays must have the same size.
      The first value of each array is the display name of the locale.
    For example:
    <immutables name="NLS_TEST objects">
    <array id="test_locales" type="java.lang.String[]" length="2">
    <elem value="lang1"/>
    <elem value="lang2"/>
    </array>
    <array id="test_lang1" type="java.lang.String[]" length="4">
    <elem value="LANG1"/>
    <elem value="lang1_m1"/>
    <elem value="lang1_m2"/>
    <elem value="lang1_m3"/>
    </array>
    <array id="test_lang2" type="java.lang.String[]" length="4">
    <elem value="LANG2"/>
    <elem value="lang2_m1"/>
    <elem value="lang2_m2"/>
    <elem value="lang2_m3"/>
    </array>
    </immutables>
    See Also:
    Immutables

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BasicImmutablesNLS(java.lang.String header)
      Creates a BasicImmutablesNLS instance specifying the header.
      The first locale is set as current.

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage(int messageID,
                                   java.lang.String locale)
        Gets the message matching the specified ID in the specified locale. The first message has an ID of 1.
        Specified by:
        getMessage in class NLS
        Parameters:
        messageID - the ID of the message to retrieve
        locale - the locale to use
        Returns:
        the message at the specified ID
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if the immutable [header]_[locale] does not exist
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the given messageID does not match a valid message
